name: RE;Escape Lite
description:
After being locked up for eternity, you’ve finally got a chance to ESCAPE. All you need to do is complete the three deadly courses.

Do you have enough time to finish them?

Rules:

  • Finish each chapter within a time limit to earn your freedom.
  • Beware of the enemies as they will decrease your time.
  • Avoid magenta fields. Unless you want to start over…

Controls:

  • A and D or Left Arrow and Right Arrow to move left and right.
  • Use SPACE to jump or 2x SPACE to double jump.
  • While on the wall use SPACE to wall jump

Credits:

Game Design, Art, and Coding: Wiktor Wnekowicz
Music and SFX: Maks Lubinski

Bonus:

If you are up for a challenge, try harder difficulty by typing hardmode in your prison cell.

(Don’t worry you can always go back by typing normmode or babymode if you want a carefree run and listen to some good music.)
